roleset.name: provide a pattern for
roleset.note: TEMPLATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

role.descr: thing a template is provided for

example.name: template-v
example.text: Nanomechanical devices and algorithmic self - assembly have also been demonstrated , and these DNA structures have been used *PRO* to template the arrangement of other molecules such as gold nanoparticles and streptavidin proteins .
example.arg: the arrangement of other molecules such as gold nanoparticles and streptavidin proteins
